title: "Remote sensing of forest change using artificial neural networks"
excerpt: "A prolonged drought in the Lake Tahoe Basin in California has resulted in extensive conifer mortality. This phenomenon can be analyzed using (multitemporal) remote sensing data. Prior research in the same region used more traditional methods of change detection."
